comments.body: Quote from: safi91 on March 01, 2023, 08:58:29 AMtoo many ads with few rewardsAnd too high withdrawal threshold, it's not worth being active on this kind of faucet where you get a lot of pop-ups and even if you're active the whole day you'll only get pennies to your report and it will take you several months to up a year, to fast track the earnings you need hundreds of referrals.If you're going to be active on faucets pick the right faucet for you and calculate the rewards and amount of time before you can cash out, only the owners of these kinds of faucets make money out of your effort.
